content: As a language model AI, I'm not able to predict or know about the budget of companies, but investing in cybersecurity measures is crucial to protect remote workers and the company as a whole from cyber threats. While the upfront costs of implementing these measures may seem high, the long-term costs of a major cyber attack can be devastating. Cyber attacks can result in the loss of sensitive and confidential data, damage to the company's reputation, legal penalties, and financial losses. Therefore, companies need to make cybersecurity a top priority and invest appropriately in security measures to protect their remote workforce and the business as a whole.
